original_text: Ahithophel was the king's advisor, and Hushai, from Arki, was also the king's friend. Ahithophel was the king's advisor, and Hushai, from Arki, was also the king's friend.
korean_text: 아히도벨은 왕의 모사가 되었고 아렉 사람 후새는 왕의 벗이 되었고

sentences.original_text: and Hushai, from Arki, was also the king's friend
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 아르키 출신 후새도 왕의 친구였습니다
